profile.name: Rakshit Pujari
profile.title: SAP Technical Consultant
profile.summary: SAP Certified Integration Developer and a SAP Consultant with a masterâ€™s in Supply Chain Engineering and 3+ years of S/4HANA experience in SAP CAP (Node.js), ABAP OO, RAP, CDS/VDM, OData services, and Fiori Elements. Experienced in end-to-end development of cloud-native applications on SAP BTP and HANA Cloud, virtual data modeling, and side-by-side extensions for SD-aligned order-to-cash and order-to-invoice processes at BASF and Threerun. Strong background in data analytics and process optimization from prior roles at AXA and Tata Motors, combining technical depth with excellent stakeholder communication, client-facing consulting, and cross-functional collaboration. Proficient in German (C1) and English, with a proven ability to translate complex business requirements into robust, scalable SAP solutions.
